ygData.subject: illusion:death
ygData.msgSnippet: OK guys, i made this feedback request to verant. i am surprised that no one has brought it up (though i dont look too hard on the net). here goes: Monks have
ygData.messageBody:
OK guys, i made this feedback request to verant. i am surprised that no one
has brought it up (though i dont look too hard on the net). here goes:

Monks have feign death. Necros have a feign death spell. But we,
ILLUSIONISTS in nature, have no Illusion:Death spell. we can make ourselves
look like any race plus a few on Norrath, but we cant make ourselves look
dead. why not?

what does everyone else think of this? should we be allowed to have this
spell?

(on a side note, where can i find the earth elemental illusion spell? i
cant find it in freeport...)

Qorona Mindbender of the Volition Guild, 24th lvl enchanter on Cazic-Thule
-------------------
tim borrelli
computer character animator and crackhead extraordinaire
Volition, Inc.
timmyland@...
